body: Made a few minor updates to keep the documentation current..

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body: @andschwa , @vors  - Any idea why travis-ci is failing?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @raghushantha yeah, this was submitted from a fork, and we're a private repo. See [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md#why-did-my-travis-ci-build-fail-with-github_token-variable-is-undefined-please-provide-token).

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body: @andschwa - Then this PR is invalid. I will close and create a new one

title: Updates to ReadMe/WindowsInstallation docs
